event.title: C# 8 with Jon Skeet
event.description:
Happy new year!

To kick off 2020, we've got Jon Skeet coming to Bristol to talk about everything that's new with C# 8.

⚠ Note - this event is taking place at DNV GL, not Just Eat

👩‍💻 About Jon:
Jon Skeet is "that C# guy from Stack Overflow". Elsewhere, he's a Staff Developer Programs Engineer at Google London, maintaining the .NET client libraries for Google Cloud Platform, amongst other things.

🎤The talk:
C# 8. It's the 8th major version of C#. It has lots of features. You'll find out about them.

⌚ Come along from 18:30 - we'll aim to start the talk at 19:00
